dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Lives in vegetated areas in shallow water.  Feeds on small fishes, mainly juvenile Utaka or other shoaling species (Ref. 5595).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  widely distributed in Lake Malawi, upper Shire River and Lake Malombe.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Eastern Africa: Lakes Malawi and Malombe and upper Shiré River.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#DiagnosticDescription
dataObjects.description: Diagnosis: easily recognised by its compressed head and body (Ref. 55954).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: benthopelagic; freshwater; pH range: 8.0 - 8.0; dH range: 9 - 19
